javax.mail.event
Class MessageCountAdapter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.mail.event.MessageCountAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, MessageCountListener
public abstract class MessageCountAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageCountListener

The adapter which receives MessageCount events. The methods in this class are empty; this class is provided as a convenience for easily creating listeners by extending this class and overriding only the methods of interest.
